title: Provided that, no automatic detector shall be required in any room or portion of a building which is equipped with an approved installation of automatic sprinklers
clause_text: Provided that, no automatic detector shall be required in any room or portion of a building which is equipped with an approved installation of automatic sprinklers.
section: All other buildings exceeding 32 m. height excluding those mentioned in clause (i) above: -
